mdRecord.dcterms:title: Photograph of Congressman Moore with his wife
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Congressman Arch A. Moore, Jr. with his wife Shelley Moore. Moore is wearing a tux and Shelley is in an elegant dress with elbow length gloves.
